titles.title: Merchant Marine Memorial Enhancement Act of 1993
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey vessels in the National Defense Reserve Fleet to certain nonprofit organizations.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14765-14766)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 11/1/1993--Introduced. Merchant Marine Memorial Enhancement Act of 1993 - Authorizes conveyance without consideration of two vessels in the National Defense Reserve Fleet to any nonprofit organization that operates a Liberty Ship or Victory Ship as a memorial to merchant mariners. Requires the organization to sell the vessel for scrap, use the proceeds to refurbish a Liberty Ship or Victory Ship to enable the ship to participate in activities concerning the 50th anniversary of the Normandy invasion, and return any unused proceeds to the United States for deposit in the Vessel Operations Revolving Fund.
